column2: Datos_mapaUE6 <- Nº_TotalEU|> filter(Year=="2020",Tipo=="Pais", A=="Bovino")|> select(geo, values)

ggplot(mapaUE6) + geom_sf(aes(fill = values), color = "white", linewidth = 0.1) + coord_sf(crs = 3035, xlim = c(2500000, 6500000), ylim = c(1500000, 5200000)) + scale_fill_viridis_c(option = "magma", labels = scales::label_comma(big.mark = "."), name = "Miles de cabezas") + theme_void() + labs(title = "Número de bovinos por país (2020)") + theme(plot.title = element_text(face = "bold", size = 11))
